turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a Starbucks drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you want a grande mocha latte with 2% milk and no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on 27th Street in Manhattan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande mocha latte with 2% milk and no whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 27th street in manhattan, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
